about.title: About Us...
text: Originally built during the age of the Arathorian Empire and known as 'The Hocus Pocus Inn',
The Legerdemain Lounge is now a well know destination for adventures all throughout Azeroth.
Whether it is a cold drink or a warm bed, the Legerdemain Lounge can accomidate your needs.

hours.title: Hours of Operation
hours.text: We are happy to serve you every hour of every day of the year! *

locations.title: Locations
text: Above The Broken Isles, 626 K.C. - Present
locations.subText: Temporal locations included for the chromatically abled.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
text: The accomidations are lovely and the coffee pot is always full. I come here every day! -Trevor Page
De grub be good, but stay away from de gnoll stew. -Ol'Toomba
